headline: Democracy’s Survival And Future of Nation  Weigh on Voters’ Minds
text: OMAHA — A nation with nearly 8 percent unemployment and mourning more than 231,000 Covid deaths, where four out of five Americans say they feel nervous about the country’s future, gets a final chance Tuesday to decide which candidate is best equipped to lead it past those daunting numbers.
snippet: Voters describe a fundamental unease about America’s future.
